steps.title: Here’s your objective.
steps.description:
In this mission, you’ll drive and turn EV3RSTORM.

Build EV3RSTORM 01.

steps.title: Let’s try it out!
steps.description: Place EV3RSTORM on a smooth surface, then download and run the program.

hints.Text:
1. Press the connect icon and follow the on-screen instructions.
2. Download and run the program.
2. Download the program to your EV3 Brick.
3. Run the program from your EV3 Brick.

steps.title: Mission accomplished!
steps.description:
EV3RSTORM should do what’s shown in the video when running the program.

If EV3RSTORM doesn’t turn in the same direction the eyes look, make sure the Large Motors are connected to the correct ports on the EV3.

You’ve completed this mission!
